html:
The blessing and cursing in verses 19 and 20 are repeated by the Lord in D&C 64 of the Doctrine and Covenants, with specific reference to the inhabitants of "the land of Zion in these last days."

If ye be willing and obedient. ye shall eat the good of the land:

But if ye refuse and rebel, ye shall be devoured with the sword: for the mouth of the Lord hath spoken it. (Isaiah 1:19-20.)

Behold, the Lord requireth the heart and a willing mind; and the willing and obedient shall eat the good of the land of Zion in these last days.

And the rebellious shall be cut off out of the land of Zion, and shall be sent away, and shall not inherit the land. (D&C 64: 34-35.)
